automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_sunset_warm_60'
alias: Office WLED Sunset Warm 60%
description: "At sunset every day, turn on the Office WLED light to 60% brightness and set it to a warm white color."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: sun
    event: sunset
conditions: []
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness: 153
      rgb_color:
        - 255
        - 180
        - 100
